mapper.select: SELECT S.NO, S.MEMBER_NO, M.NAME, S.BASE_PAY, S.PLUS_PAY, S.REST_PAY, S.EAT_PAY, S.HOLIDAY_PAY, S.BONUS_PAY, S.NATIONAL_PAY, S.HEALTH_PAY, S.EMP_PAY, S.INCOME_PAY, S.LOCAL_PAY, S.SALARY_PAY, S.MINUS_PAY, S.REAL_PAY, TO_CHAR("PAY_DATE", 'YYYY-MM') AS "PAY_DATE" FROM SALARY S , MEMBER M WHERE S.MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND M.NAME = #{name} AND PAY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YYYY-MM') AND TO_DATE(#{endDay},'YYYY-MM')
